title: Rahu Transit in the 7th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting your seventh house brings intense focus on partnerships, marriage, and public dealings. Attraction toward unconventional or foreign-minded partners increases, while expectations in relationships become amplified. Alliances may form suddenly, but clarity can be missing at first. Business partnerships and contracts demand careful scrutiny. This transit teaches balance between desire and commitment, helping you understand which relationships are built on illusion and which can sustain long-term growth.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Strong desire for validation through partnerships.
Identity becomes influenced by others’ reactions.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Sudden attractions and intense bonds form.
Commitment may feel confusing or delayed.
Power imbalance can surface in marriage.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Legal or contractual costs may arise.

closing: Rahu in the 7th house magnifies partnerships. When clarity leads desire, relationships become growth-oriented rather than draining.
